alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:51PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun, west central Clarendon, southwestern Sumter and north central Orangeburg Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookdale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, St. Matthews, Cameron, Prince of Orange Mall, Rimini, Creston, Stumphole Landing, Lone Star and Low Falls Landing. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 139 and 149. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter
